Storylines?

By CRAZY CRAZY MATIZMO on Wednesday, July 10, 2002 - 04:38 pm:

i heard you can only be involved in one storyline at a time. and a new one cant start until you've finished the one youre in. im in brilla invovld in the zan thing, (it isnt over i havent gotten the disk or fought the zan) then i went to kalagrai (or however you spell it) and had my mone stolen! this is part of its storyline! whats going on!?!?!?!?!

By Jason on Sunday, July 14, 2002 - 09:41 am:

It's part of the kalagari storyline, do not worry. Be sure you have a strong monster though and SAVE immediatly before spending more time in kalagari, as you shall fight Gadamon soon, and if you lose you'll fall into the infernal pit of the dodorin(spelling?) fruit bug. What I did when going through storylines is I stayed in the 'new' area until I completed its storyline, then moved onto others.
